description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbna3","text":"Accurate pipetting is critical for producing precise in vitro assay results. However, since pipetting is such a routine task, many researchers believe their pipetting is precise enough. Rarely do they critically evaluate their own pipetting. This protocol provides an affordable way to assess one's own pipetting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: California Department of Food and Agriculture

image_attribution: {"blocks":[{"key":"8qgvc","text":"For permission to use the image or to contact the creator of the image, irod, please contact the lead author at gregor.blaha@ucr.edu","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"1n1bc","text":"Part A:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca5f3","text":"Micropipettes with adjustable volume of 100 – 1000 µL and 20 – 200 µL (ideally recently calibrated). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9btes","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5110t","text":"Pipette tips recommended by manufacturer of micropipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pmos","text":"Analytical balance with 0.1 mg or better precision.
For developing this SOP, an A&D HR-60 analytical balance was used. The balance was placed on a workbench in a low-traffic area and away from any drafts created by heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC). To minimize vibrations, the balance rested on a marble slab. The balance was leveled using the level bubble on the back of the balance. The air humidity in the area was increased using a humidifier. In addition, a water-soaked 3.5” x 5.5” x 0.5” sponge sitting in a water-filled reservoir was placed inside the balance’s draft shield. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1ti9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tn52","text":"Medium-sized antistatic weighing boat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24k7b","text":"
Water at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9gpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfcbl","text":"Part B:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64e8a","text":"Spectrophotometer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d99v4","text":"        
5 and 10 mL volumetric or serological pipette with less than 0.2% error. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crqa3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs68r","text":"Electronic pipette aid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa86v","text":"        
4 mL transfer pipettes with elongated stem (Fisher cat.: 501960843)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c33oa","text":"
1 bag of hundred 5 mL centrifuge tubes (Eppendorf cat.: 003011401)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t9fj","text":"
K3[Fe(CN)6] (VWR cat.: TS22311-100)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":2,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l8dl","text":"        
100% [v/v] glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aolao","text":"        
Six 50 mL conical centrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3eflj","text":"        
50 mL volumetric flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b20j","text":"        
Vortex (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
